radiographic_examinations.findings: Mild bibasilar atelectasis; visualized lung fields are within normal limits. No evidence of pleural or pericardial effusion. Enlarged appendix measuring 12 mm in diameter, filled with fluid, consistent with acute appendicitis. Surrounding fat mildly stranded. No fluid collection or macro perforation seen. Multiple mildly enlarged mesenteric lymph nodes in the right lower quadrant likely reactive. Small amount of free fluid in the pelvis.
